channel.title: Gustavo Dudamel on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Gustavo Dudamel on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Esa-Pekka Salonen Back With the Los Angeles Philharmonic
item.description: The Finnish conductor, who served as music director from 1992-2009 before being replaced by Gustavo Dudamel, has accepted a new role as creative director.
